Body:
file_name = 'plop'
db = DataBase(file_name)
try:
    await db.initialize()
    assert not await db.check_table_exists(ExchangeDataTables.KLINE)
    with pytest.raises(OperationalError):
        await db.check_table_not_empty(ExchangeDataTables.KLINE)
finally:
    await db.stop()
    os.remove(file_name)
